.. java:import:: it.unicam.cs.pa.mastermind.ui ConsoleGameView

.. java:import:: it.unicam.cs.pa.mastermind.ui GameView

ConsoleGameViewFactory
======================

.. java:package:: it.unicam.cs.pa.mastermind.factories
   :noindex:

.. java:type:: public class ConsoleGameViewFactory implements GameViewFactory

   Classe factory estensione di \ ``GameViewFactory``\  impiegata per ottenere istanze di \ ``ConsoleGameView``\ .

   :author: Francesco Pio Stelluti, Francesco Coppola

Methods
-------

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

.. java:method:: @Override public GameView getNewInstance()
   :outertype: ConsoleGameViewFactory
